tool_description: A RESTful API giving you the latest news on stocks and cryptocurrencies, as well as stock picks.
name: Realtime Stock Market
title: Realtime Stock Market

api_list.name: Crypto news
api_list.description: Returns an array of objects representing news articles about cryptocurrencies.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://realtime-stock-market1.p.rapidapi.com/crypto"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "realtime-stock-market1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
